boost/idl/get_typestring.hpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**
00002  *  @file get_typestring.hpp
00003  *
00004  *  This file provides a means to get a const char* name of
00005  *  a class without using RTTI.  The name is then cross-platform.
00006  *
00007  */
00008 
00009 #ifndef _BOOST_IDL_GET_TYPESTRING_HPP_
00010 #define _BOOST_IDL_GET_TYPESTRING_HPP_
00011 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00012 #include <string>
00013 #include <typeinfo>
00014 #include <map>
00015 #include <stdint.h>
00016 
00017 namespace boost { namespace idl {
00018 
00019 /**
00020  *  Inheriting from self is desired to cause error if this 
00021  *  template is instantiated without one of the specializations.
00022  */
00023 template< typename T>
00024 struct get_typestring 
00025 {
00026     static const char* str() { return typeid(T).name(); }
00027     enum is_defined_enum{ is_defined = 0 };
00028 };
00029 
00030 
00031 template<typename K, typename V>
00032 struct get_typestring< std::map<K,V> >
00033 {
00034     enum is_defined_enum{ is_defined = get_typestring<K>::is_defined && get_typestring<V>::is_defined  };
00035     static const char* str()
00036     {
00037         static std::string ts( "std::map<" + std::string(get_typestring<K>::str()) +","+ std::string(get_typestring<V>::str())+">" );
00038         return ts.c_str();
00039     }
00040 };
00041 
00042 
00043 } } // namespace boost::idl
00044 
00045 #include <boost/idl/get_function_signature.hpp>
00046 
00047 #define DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING(...) \
00048     namespace boost { namespace idl { template<> struct get_typestring<__VA_ARGS__> { enum is_defined_enum{ is_defined = 1 }; static const char* str() { return #__VA_ARGS__; } }; } }
00049 
00050 #define DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS(NAME,...) \
00051     namespace boost { namespace idl { template<> struct get_typestring<__VA_ARGS__> { enum is_defined_enum{ is_defined = 1 }; static const char* str() { return NAME; } }; } }
00052 
00053 #define BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING_ALIAS( NAME, ... ) \
00054     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( NAME, __VA_ARGS__ ) \
00055     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( "const "NAME, const __VA_ARGS__ ) \
00056     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( "const "NAME"&", const __VA_ARGS__& ) \
00057     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( "const "NAME"*", const __VA_ARGS__* ) \
00058     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( NAME"&", __VA_ARGS__& ) \
00059     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( NAME"*", __VA_ARGS__* ) \
00060     DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING_ALIAS( NAME"**", __VA_ARGS__** ) 
00061   
00062 /**
00063  *  @def BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(...)
00064  *
00065  *  Defines the get_typestring<> template for the given type.
00066  */
00067 #define BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(...) \
00068     BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING_ALIAS( #__VA_ARGS__, __VA_ARGS__ )
00069 
00070 DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING(void)
00071 DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING(void*)
00072 DEFINE_GETTYPESTRING(void**)
00073 
00074 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(float)
00075 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(double)
00076 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(bool)
00077 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(int64_t)
00078 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(uint64_t)
00079 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(int32_t)
00080 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(uint32_t)
00081 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(int16_t)
00082 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(uint16_t)
00083 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(uint8_t)
00084 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(int8_t)
00085 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(std::string)
00086 
00087 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00088 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(char)
00089 #endif // _MSC_VER
00090 
00091 #endif
